article_text:
Former Congressman Heath Shuler and former state Rep. Deborah Ross seem poised to enter Senate race

Primary would raise questions about North Carolina Democratic strategy: reach to the middle or rally the base

Republican Sen. Richard Burr is likely to be a strong candidate

article_metadata.news-keywords: Rob Christensen, Heath Shuler, Deborah Ross, Richard Burr
article_metadata.description: A Democratic Senate primary may be shaping up next year between former Congressman Heath Shuler of Waynesville and former state Rep. Deborah Ross of Raleigh.
article_metadata.title: Shuler-Ross NC Democratic Senate primary possible | News & Observer
